long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bingo Skeleton Page Extension - turn any HTML page into a 'loading state' Skeleton for your applications. 

Supports the Bingo Skeleton Page Plugin for bubble.io applications.

To use:

1. Visit any webpage
2. Right click -> Bingo Skeleton Page Extension
3. First 'Generate Skeleton Page'
4. Then 'Copy Skeleton Page' 
5. Done!
